p: The pandemic of COVID‐19 has lasted for around 5 months, and so far, the main affected areas have from the original outbreak China to outside regions, especially American and Europe. Fortunately, we already accumulated some knowledge about the pathogen virus, its epidemiological and clinical features, pathogenesis and some effective therapeutic approaches, summarized above, which have contributed to the success against COVID‐19 and will help human being completely control the epidemic finally.
